act:
1244063 THE VACCINATION (REPEAL) ACT, 2001
ACT NO. 16 OF 2001 [ 3rd August, 2001.]
An Act to repeal the Vaccination Act, 1880.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- second Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
993960 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Vaccination (Repeal) Act, 2001.
547392 2Repeal of Act 13 of 1880.- The Vaccination Act, 1880 is hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secretary to the Govt. of India.
